title: Looking for type poster / screen print sites
content: Looking to find some nice prints focused on type or design... any good sites you know of?
author: bamaurer

comments.content: There are some nice ones at [InkFinger](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022131323/http:/www.inkfinger.us/store). I bought the Punc. and Readability prints for myself.
